Select Best Model Based on BIC

best_BIC_model.Rd

Extracts the best-fitting model from a robularized_SSM_list object according to the Bayesian Information Criterion (BIC), while excluding models with more than 50% outlying observations.

Usage

best_BIC_model(model_list)

Arguments

model_list

An object of class robularized_SSM_list

Value

A single robularized_SSM object corresponding to the model with the smallest BIC among those with fewer than 50% outlying observations.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Assuming `models` is a robularized_SSM_list:
best_model <- best_BIC_model(models)
} # }
